title: Quantum State Estimation
description: This course will introduce graduate students in NUS to the concepts and methods of quantum state estimation, and thereby enable them to draw inference from data acquired in quantum experiments.
prerequisite:
This module is open to all students at CQT, and those in
Physics, Mathematics, and Statistics. Students from other departments and faculties are welcome, but it is advisable
that they discuss their background with the lecturer before
registering.
